slides.title: The AI Privacy Problem
slides.subtitle: Why traditional AI feels risky.

content: Data Training: Your secrets help train their next model.
Subscription Bleed: Expensive monthly fees for every user.
Cloud Lock-in: Hard to switch between AI providers.
Privacy Tax: Giving up data for convenience.

slides.notes: Highlight the pain points of current cloud-only AI solutions.

slides.title: The Tandem Solution
slides.subtitle: Local control, global intelligence.
slides.notes: Transition to how Tandem addresses these problems.

slides.title: Folder-Wide Intelligence
slides.subtitle: AI that understands your entire workspace.

content: Beyond Single Files: Tandem reads your whole project folder.
Context-Aware: It knows how your documents relate to each other.
Instant Search: Find information across hundreds of files instantly.
Synthesis: Summarize findings from across your entire library.

slides.notes: Explain the 'Workspace' concept for non-technical users.

slides.title: Chat with Your Documents
slides.subtitle: Interactive work, no coding required.

content: Natural Language: Just talk to your files.
Drafting: 'Write an email based on these three meeting notes.'
Analysis: 'Find inconsistencies in these contract drafts.'
Research: 'Compare the methodologies in these 50 PDFs.'

slides.notes: Show how people actually interact with the app.

slides.title: You Are the Boss
slides.subtitle: Supervised AI for total peace of mind.

content: Permission System: Tandem asks before reading or writing any file.
Visual Review: See exactly what the AI wants to do.
Full Undo: One-click rollback for any operation.
No Rogue Actions: You are always in the loop.

slides.title: Bring Your Own Key
slides.subtitle: Pay only for what you use.

content: No Monthly Fees: Use your own API keys (Anthropic, OpenAI, etc.).
Cost Effective: Pay pennies for a day's work instead of $20/month.
Provider Choice: Switch between the best models in seconds.
OpenRouter Support: Access hundreds of specialized models easily.
Ollama Integration: Run AI models entirely on your computer.
No internet Needed: Work securely in any environment.
Zero Telemetry: We never track what you do or see your data.
Air-Gapped Ready: Perfect for high-security documentation.
Writers: Character and plot consistency checks.
Researchers: Rapid synthesis of large document sets.
Legal/Finance: Secure analysis of sensitive contracts.
Students: A personal tutor for your local study notes.
